service_categories.description: All treatments begin with a whole-body relaxation rite
service_categories.name: Facial

Ayurvedic Massage.description: Traditional Hawaiian temple massage resulting in a intense release of tension such that the soul is again in harmony with the body
Ayurvedic Massage.name: Lomi-Lomi Massage

Ayurvedic Massage.description: Hot lava stones are placed on the energy centers of the body and then an oil massage is performed using the stones
Ayurvedic Massage.name: Hot-Cold Stone Massage

Facial.description: Cleaning, skin-analysis, deep-cleansing, brief massage, restorative treatment
Facial.name: Standard Facial

Foot Care.description: Includes: heat compress, natural exfoliation, calf massage, and a glass of sparkling wine
Foot Care.name: Pedicure

Foot Care.description: Targetted pressure is applied to reflex points on the foot to alleviate pain throughout the body
Foot Care.name: Reflexzone Massage
